column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I'm elated about their brunch menu!!! Every single item is great--well
column2: at least the ones I've tried so far. Short rib chilaquiles are my favorite--a perfect
column3: succulent portion! The pork belly tacos are great too
column4: but a bit small. The bosscat fries are good
column5: but their special sauce isn't anything special
column6: can't tell much of a difference from regular ketchup... and their "fruity pebbles" French toast is a pretty nice treat too! I like the location and upbeat atmosphere
column7: and staff is pretty nice. Can't wait to try them out for lunch!
